title: Bug 116744: Dynamic text content type has no effect
OB: The report displays the same results regardless of setting the dynamic text element's Content Type property to Auto, Plain, or HTML.
EB:
I expect the report to display different results based on the dynamic text element's Content Type property:

- For Plain, I expect the literal content (tags and all) to be displayed.
- For Auto, I expect that content 1, 2, and 3 appear properly without HTML or RTF tags.
- For HTML, I expect that content 1 and 2 appear properly without HTML tags, and content 3 appears literally with RTF tags.

Please refer to the attached report.
SR:
1. Open the report.
2. Set the dynamic text element's Content Type property to Plain.
3. Observe the displayed content.
4. Set the dynamic text element's Content Type property to Auto.
5. Observe the displayed content again.
6. Set the dynamic text element's Content Type property to HTML.
7. Observe the displayed content once more.

Note: The attached report can be used for reference.
